content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to quality healthcare",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that connects patients with volunteer doctors for remote medical consultations",
    "content_solution": "Ebook on self-diagnosing common illnesses and providing first-aid",
    "competitors": "Doctor on Demand, Teladoc Health",
    "differentiator": "Free access to volunteer doctors"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inability to afford healthy meals",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Meal planning app that creates affordable and healthy meal plans based on user preferences",
    "content_solution": "Blog series on how to cook healthy meals on a budget",
    "competitors": "HelloFresh, Blue Apron",
    "differentiator": "Affordable meal plans"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inadequate access to education resources",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that provides free educational resources and connects students with volunteer teachers for remote tutoring sessions",
    "content_solution": "Video course on how to learn any subject on your own",
    "competitors": "Khan Academy, Chegg",
    "differentiator": "Free access to volunteer teachers"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of access to affordable legal advice",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that connects users with affordable and experienced lawyers for remote legal consultations",
    "content_solution": "Ebook on how to represent yourself in small claims court",
    "competitors": "LegalZoom, Avvo",
    "differentiator": "Affordable legal consultations"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to affordable mental healthcare",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that provides free mental health resources and connects users with volunteer therapists for remote therapy sessions",
    "content_solution": "Video course on how to practice self-care for mental health",
    "competitors": "Talkspace, BetterHelp",
    "differentiator": "Free access to volunteer therapists"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inadequate access to career development resources",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that provides free career resources and connects users with career coaches for remote coaching sessions",
    "content_solution": "Ebook on how to find and land your dream job",
    "competitors": "LinkedIn Learning, Udemy",
    "differentiator": "Free access to career coaches"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inability to afford fitness equipment or gym memberships",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Fitness app that provides workout plans that require no equipment and can be done from home",
    "content_solution": "Podcast series on how to stay motivated to workout at home",
    "competitors": "FitOn, Nike Training Club",
    "differentiator": "Equipment-free workouts"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inadequate access to financial planning resources",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that provides free financial planning resources and connects users with financial advisors for remote consultations",
    "content_solution": "Ebook on how to create and stick to a budget",
    "competitors": "Personal Capital, Vanguard",
    "differentiator": "Free access to financial advisors"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to affordable childcare",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that connects parents with affordable and trusted babysitters for virtual babysitting sessions",
    "content_solution": "Blog series on how to create a safe and engaging home environment for children",
    "competitors": "Care.com, Sittercity",
    "differentiator": "Affordable virtual babysitting sessions"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to healthy and affordable personal care products",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "Online platform that connects users with affordable and eco-friendly personal care products",
    "content_solution": "Video course on how to make your own natural personal care products at home",
    "competitors": "Public Goods, Grove Collaborative",
    "differentiator": "Eco-friendly personal care products"
  }
]
